Name: Cajun Nail
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with water and set aside.
Separately, STIR whiskey, liqueur and bitters with ice.
DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice).
STRAIN stirred cocktail into absinthe-coated glass (no ice in glass).
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: A riff on the classic Sazerac.
History: Created in 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Cajun Nail contains 199 calories
